page.title: 15 ENTERTAINMENTS HALL.
page.content: The Winter Gardens in Cleethorpes is a popular venue for live and recorded music.It has a capacity of 700 people with meat and vegatable meals being popular. Admission is usually by ticket, priced between Â£1-Â£2. Customers usually arrive by car and the most popular drink is beer although one calorie drinks are gaining in popularity. Up to thirty different events are held each month. The 'Gardens' employs up to 250 people to serve on a casual basis.It is a popular venue for antiques fairs. Stalls are hired for the day where professional and amateur dealers show their stock to the public. Trends in collecting in 1985 favour collecting items less than a century old. Items such as cigarette lighters which have quickly become obsolescent are especially sought after.
